Module grupo25_projeto
Package blackjack

Class game

java.lang.Object
blackjack.game
public class game
extends java.lang.Object
This class houses game objects which are iterations of the blackjack game

  • Constructor Details

    • game

      public game​(int MIN_BET, int MAX_BET, float BALANCE, int SHOE, int SHUFFLE)
      This method implements the statistics command while in the double state
      Parameters:
      MIN_BET - represents the minimum bet possible for the player
      MAX_BET - represents the maximum bet possible for the player
      BALANCE - represents the initial balance of the player
      SHOE - represents the number of decks present in the shoe
      SHUFFLE - represent the percentage of shoe played before shuffling

    • game

      public game​(int MIN_BET, int MAX_BET, float BALANCE, int SHOE, java.lang.String[] shoeFile)
      This method implements the statistics command while in the double state
      Parameters:
      MIN_BET - represents the minimum bet possible for the player
      MAX_BET - represents the maximum bet possible for the player
      BALANCE - represents the initial balance of the player
      SHOE - represents the number of decks present in the shoe
      shoeFile - is an array of strings that contains all the cards in the shoe

  • Method Details

    • solveHandsHit

      public void solveHandsHit()
      This method verifies the state of the game after a player hits (did the bust?)

      public void solveHands()

    • isCommandAvailable

      public boolean isCommandAvailable​(java.lang.String command, GameState state)
      This method checks if a given command is valid or not
      Parameters:
      command - in form of a String
      state - which represents the current game state
      Returns:
      boolean which is true when the command is valid

    • timeToShuffle

      public boolean timeToShuffle​(int SHUFFLE, int ShoeSize, int ShoeInitialSize)
      This method checks if the shoe needs to be shuffled
      Parameters:
      SHUFFLE - represents the shuffle percentage
      ShoeSize - represents the size of the shoe
      ShoeInitialSize - represents the shoe initial size
      Returns:
      boolean which is true if the shoe is to be shuffled
